Public Remarks: Family and pet friendly Southwind. 4 level, corner location townhome with south exposed 20' x 24' fenced level yard with large deck, natural gas for the BBQ and private gate for street access from the main floor. 3 bedrooms and 2 full bath s up with a 2 piece powder on the main for guests. Top floor features a huge open entertainment area with wet bar and covered deck. Complex features Clubhouse, rec-centre & playground and is within the Semiahmoo high school catchment. 1 block to Sunnyside park with playgrounds, tennis courts, ball fields and outdoor swimming pool in the summer. Steps to shopping & transit and 2 minutes to freeway. Easy to show and quick completion possible! No Rentals, 2 pets allowed, cats or small dogs.

Public Remarks: Perfect for investors or first-time home buyers! Concrete high-rise with unobstructed mountain views in Central Richmond, priced to sell! Act fast, this one-bedroom plus den suite features gorgeous mountain views, an excellent floor plan with no wasted space, spacious den for study or storage, new laminate flooring and new paint. Bedroom can comfortably fit a King Size bed and features a walk-through en-suite bathroom. Low strata fees and includes gas, hot-water and full amenities. Fullerton developed by Concord Pacific group offers a fully equipped exercise gym, huge recreation room and roof-top garden to entertain.  Call for viewing!

Public Remarks: Rarely available, this immaculately kept two bdrm two full bath townhouse is located at The Edge. Built by the respected Lakewood Development, building quality townhouses in Greater Vancouver since the 1970's. Main flr features 9 ft ceilings, fireplace in your entertaining size living rm, laminate flrs in your kitchen/nook & family rm. Kitchen w/granite countertops, tile backsplash and shaker style cabinets. Good size balcony overlooking the inner courtyard. Master fits a king size bdrm plus ensuite with double sinks. Laundry is conveniently located upstairs. Fully fenced backyard through your tandem garage. Steps away from the new Katzie Elementary and minutes from shopping. Bonus low maint fee of 138.55! Easy to show!  OPEN SAT & SUN 2-4PM

Public Remarks: The Premier Location for a 2 bedroom & 2 bathroom suite at 522 Smith Ave, just steps from the new in 2016, Burquitlam Skytrain Station. Commuters opportunity with new shopping mall being developed & other new condos selling at much higher prices in the neighborhood. This Suite is Extra Special !! Southeast corner suite with views toward Metrotown & Burnaby Lake. Vaulted Ceilings in the living room with almost floor to ceiling windows. Updated appliances, Fresh Coat of Designer Paint throughout. Beautiful layout, large bedrooms, flex room or den, Insuite Laundry. Special Building: Concrete, Not Frame Construction. 2 Parking spots side by side. 2 Pets are okay. Come See This Beauty. This Won't Last Long!

Public Remarks: Lovely and spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in a great revived Marpole location, close to Safeway, shops, restaurants , parks and transit! Facing the quiet courtyard side, this sunny and bright Southwest suite is bright and cheery -- in a proactive building with balconies and roofs already done. Call now to view-note pets are allowed but there are no rentals permitted and it is age restricted to 19+. Assessment has been approved for rainscreening work and Seller will be paying for it.

Urban and transit-focused living is right at your doorstep in the brilliant new community of MC2! Shop for groceries, go to the bank, have dinner, see a movie, work out the gym  all within a 5 minute walk of your home. Canada Line & bus loop are just across the street to get you to YVR Airport in 9 mins & Downtown Vancouver in 15 mins! Your new home has a gourmet Blomberg appliance pkg in the kitchen w/solid caesarstone countertops; bathroom features a soaker tub & marble polished countertops; bedroom includes Italian built-in wardrobe. Real eco-engineered Terra Wood flooring in your living & dining room & a JAGA air cooling system for hot summer days. 1 storage included. Call for more details!

Public Remarks: A spacious 2 bedroom + 2 bathroom + huge balcony condo unit with spectacular view on Metrotown just near Central Park. Public Remarks: Well designed Pepperwood located in an incredible Willoughby location. #16 has many differences as layout and located. Individual entry gate and walkway with like private yard. Situated in a quiet residential setting, within few minutes for shopping, schools, restaurants, recreation and Golf Courses. Ideally located near major commuter and downtown Langley. Easy access to Hwy 1 and Fraser Hwy. Comfortable kitchen of open concept with high-end appliances, countertop and sink. Enjoy with wonderful amenities as gym, pool, hot tub, clubhouse, hockey and billiards room. Contemporary open living spaces with durable hardwood laminate flooring throughout main and lower living levels. Pls don't miss this great house.

Public Remarks: RARE! 3 bedroom/ 2.5 bathroom townhome in The Argyle. Beautifully kept with espresso cabinets and granite in the kitchen with island/eating bar and stainless steel appliances. The workable kitchen opens to the bright dining area & family room that overlooks the backyard. Upstairs you will find three bedrooms & two more bathrooms - all of the finishing throughout is crisp and clean which gives this home a comfortable, modern feel. The backyard is exceptionally large for this complex, is fenced and great for kids or pets. The double, side by side garage is also a bonus! The complex is central to school, shopping, freeway access for easy commuting and has an on site park which the families will love. Pets & rentals are allowed!

Public Remarks: Very large property (2.49 Acres) well located on Grafton Road. A large front section of land is cleared and ready for use and has Electricity connection on site. Possible uses include - Residential, Farm or Hobby Farm, Winery or Brewery, Farm Retail Business, Pet Kennels and Breeding, B & B and other possible uses. However, all intended uses by the Buyer must be approved by the Municipality and this approval must be obtained by the Buyer.

Public Remarks: Now is your chance to get into this sought-after neighborhood! Good-sized family home complete with double garage and large fenced yard. This is a solid home that has been well maintained and is ready to move in to. The home has mostly new windows, newer furnace, updated countertops and backsplash in kitchen and bathrooms, some new flooring. All it is waiting for is your finishing touch to make it your own. Three bedrooms upstairs including Master bedroom with walk in closet and 3 piece ensuit. Plenty of room for the whole family with living and family rooms on the main floor, unique and flowing floor plan. Downstairs offers large rec-room with wet bar. Quick possession possible for this great home in fantastic neighborhood close to parks, recreation and schools.
Realtor Remarks: Addendum to sale attachment must accompany all offers. Fireplaces sold as is. Vacant and easy to show.

Public Remarks: This three (possibly four) bedroom, three bathroom home has seen extensive upgrades in recent years with the owners taking care to keep some of the original charm of the home while updating the majority of the house to what you'd expect to find in a new home. The master bedroom offers an ensuite with heated tile floor, the updated kitchen is equipped with quality appliances, the living room has a harbor view that you're sure to enjoy and downstairs is a spacious rec room for the family to take advantage of as well. Outside, in addition to the landscaped front and back yards, there is a partially covered sundeck and a firepit that is great for gathering around in the evenings while watching the stunning sunsets.

Bring your fussiest clients to this immaculate and totally renovated two bedroom view suite. The upgrades are too numerous to list but do include a built-in storage closet in hallway and a breakfast bar with cupboards. The wall-to-wall windows in LR and MBRM both have sliders opening onto the HUGE 30' balcony. This exceptionally well maintained BOSA building's facilities incl. outdoor pool, exercise centre, tennis court, bike room, recreation/party room, plus a live-in caretaker. Just a 10 min. walk to either Brentwood or Holdom Skytrain Stations. 2 cats are permitted but dogs are not welcome. Rentals limited to 35 and are currently not at maximum permitted.
Realtor Remarks: NO TOUCHBASE please phone or text. Laundry on same floor. Other is HUGE balcony. 2 cats permitted but no dogs. Owners are leaving country - furniture is also negotiable.

Public Remarks: Millenio by Bosa-! at the very prime of Joyce Collingwood. Well kept 1 BDRM+DEN+Flex 700Sf. unobstructed frontal view towards park. Functional plan. Side-by-side laundry machine & can easily accommodate large furniture.

Great location corner lot right across from the park, 3 bedrooms on the main & 2 more downstairs. Main floor renovations include all new quality kitchen with plenty of cupboards & pantry cabinets. New flooring in the living, dining room & kitchen. 3 full bathrooms & lots of room downstairs for the extended family. All appliances included in both living areas. Close to all amenities & schools.

Public Remarks: The Best townhomes in Maple Ridge built by Wallmark Custom Homes for the discerning Buyer. Terraced patio in the front and balcony on the back. A great home for entertaining. Open by appointment.

Public Remarks: ADULT LIFESTYLE AT ITS BEST! Enjoy the early morning sun in this east-facing home w/excellent floor plan & outstanding amenities. Open concept Living Rm & Dining Rm w/tasteful laminate floors, 9' ceilings, crown moulding, gas f/p & custom window coverings. Bright Kitchen w/plenty of cupboard space, a pantry & pass-through to the Dining Rm. Good sized eating area just off kitchen. Spacious Master Bdrm has W/I closet, & deluxe ensuite. Main Bathroom includes a walk-in Shower. This well-run strata has lots of social events to participate in. Enjoy all the facilities including pool & hot tub, well-equipped workshop, great room, pub, & library. Close to Coquitlam Centre, Lafarge Lake. Open House  Nov 4, 2:00 to 4:00.

Public Remarks: Stunning one bedroom at Hycroft Tower! Live in this beautifully renovated, spacious one bedroom  & have instant access to all upscale South Granville has to offer! Hot water& heat included and the best  roof deck in the city! See it to believe it! Easy to show!

Public Remarks: Cute 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home in a great neighbourhood in Chilliwack. The whole house has been renovated over the last few years, including a new kitchen, windows, bathroom, & 5' fully fenced large rear yard with side lane access. Lots of room to build a shop & also RV parking. Come check it out today.

Public Remarks: Ski-in/ski-out just steps from your door! This beautifully updated 609 square foot one bedroom condo has an open living area with large windows and a great view of the courtyard. The condo also features a cozy gas fireplace, fully upgraded kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and an additional sofa bed in the living room. Glacier Lodge is one of the best locations in Whistler, a short walk to the Village with many restaurants on your doorstep, featuring a newly upgraded salt water pool and hot tubs, fitness room, underground parking, and ski lockers. A great Whistler retreat than can be rented nightly when it is not in use!

Public Remarks: Awesome Layout in Kanaka Mews Duplex style Townhome. 3Bdrm 3 Bath over 1600sf with your traditional style Living & Dining room, as well great room style Kitchen & Family room. HUGE Bedrooms. 2nd bedroom has 2 closets & 1 is a walk-in. Beautiful soaker tub with stand up shower in Ensuite. 2 closets in Master as well. Beautiful Gas FP in Large LR. Tons of large windows, natural light and excellent storage. Walk out yard w/french doors in off kitchen. Fabulous for young family. Private BY. Over 15K of upgrades just spent include New Paint from floor to ceiling. New Carpets thoughout & Flooring in Baths. New Lighting, All Hardware on Doors. Ready to move in for Christmas.

Complete stainless steel package including, 30 Whirlpool stainless steel fridge with French Doors and exterior water dispenser, 30 Whirlpool front-control ceramic top electric range with self-cleaning oven, Whirlpool stainless steel microwave with hood fan, Whirlpool stainless steel dishwasher, In-sink garburator.

Public Remarks: There have never been lots like these available in Squamish! These executive lots are located behind Quest University in a sunny community. The lots along Mamquam range in size but most are nearly 1/2 an acre and all back on to Ring Creek. The sound of the creek is absolutely magical and the views of the Tantalus Mountains from your front yard are impressive. These large, mostly level lots back on to a protected riparian set=back that allows you to view lush green space from your backyard. These lots are a must see! Lot prices are plus GST.

Public Remarks: OCEAN WALK! Absolute move-in ready, bright, open LARGE 1 bedroom and den, 670 sq. ft! Quality finishings throughout-kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite counters and hardwood flooring. Well managed complex with great rec. facilities - gym, party lounge, guest suites, live-in caretaker, large storage lockers and 20,000 sq. foot rooftop garden getaway complete with putting green. This is Richmond's new and finest central neighbourhood - short stroll to the dyke, Olympic Oval, Canada Line, shopping restaurants along No.3 Rd. and just minutes to Vancouver and the Airport. Rental and pet friendly building too. Live-in or rent out - this is an excellent investment!
Realtor Remarks: Realtor's own suite. Even though has always been rented (rent of $1350 per month), suite is in beautiful condition and shows as new.

Subjects due off DEC.23.15

Public Remarks: Wow! Excellent value & move in right away. Upgrades to building include plumbing, elevator, lobby & roof, still w/healthy reserve. walk to shops & skytrain, close to BCIT, SFU, Metrotown & Vancouver. Public Remarks: EVANSBROOK ESTATES Best Location in the Complex. Welcome to this immaculate, Comfortable, Convenient Retirement Living. A SOUTH-facing 766 sqf. 1 bedroom with a spacious patio & 10ft ceiling-living area. The ready for move in suit is on top floor of a 4-storey low rise built by Ledingham McAllister (within new home warranty).Quiet, bright and private, the unit has a versatile den, and a gliding door added to separate the flex space in the bedroom. Newly painted interior, new laminated hardwood floor, thick carpet in the bedroom, electric fireplace, Whirlpool appliance, gas stove with powerful fan, granite countertop, gym and amenity room in the building with parking spot close to the elevator...
